name: Climagic-gem
body:
### All you need to do it : 

```gem install climagic``` and in the CLI ```$ climagic``` to see the magic happen ;)

***

### Example 

~~~
climagic hemanth$ climagic 
while true; do date; printf "\033[A"; sleep 1; done
~~~
tagline: Ruby gem to get the command of the day from climagic.org
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
